customer_reviews.title: A good product for reading
customer_reviews.text: My first e-reader ever purchased. Amazing light weight and perfect screen size for reading. Response time is quite slow which makes highlighting difficult to control. I hope Kobo will add more built in Chinese input method in later OS release like pinyin or cangjie for looking up Chinese book from the store. The current zhuyin CN input method is not common in region outside Taiwan. But these has little to impact reading experience so I still find it a good product for reading. Quite a lot of people like to read comic books because of the big monitor, true but I just find the saturation is too low to make a good contrast in the lines and shades.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: Kobo Forma froze!
customer_reviews.text: I started out enjoying the kobo forma ereader. It is a nice size and easy to use. I though that the on/off switch was difficult to push though. I was very disappointed when the kobo screen simply froze. It would not charge, turn off...there was nothing that I could do to unfreeze it. It happened during the 30 day return period so I sent it back. I was reluctant to try another as I was disappointed in the overall quality. I just bought a refurbished kindle oasis. I receive it in a few days. I am hoping this will work better.
customer_reviews.author: Tessa

customer_reviews.title: TL;DR I am in love, except for one glitch
customer_reviews.text: Pros: * Very light. * Great size. * Comfortable to hold. * The back is rubbery plastic (less "premium" than a Kindle Oasis) but it actually feels great, and it probably helps with weight. * Reads standard formats (EPUB, PDF) directly. Cons / suggestions: * I'm not sure if it's only my device, but there is a bit of fairly noticeable unevenness in the lighting, on the edge where the handle/buttons are. * If you disable showing your current book on the "sleeping" screen, it would be great to have some "stock" images (as on Kindle). * Sleeves are little hard to find so far (and the slightly unusual dimension ratio makes standard tablet sleeves not a good fit).
customer_reviews.author: Manu C.

customer_reviews.title: Major Software Glitch
customer_reviews.text: There is a software malfunction that it will get to about 85% battery and then suddenly drain out to 1% - Kobo did replace mine and now the second one does it. They've been aware of this and are unable to fix it, yet continue to sell this product. Unfortunately I've been a customer for years ( up until now a happy one) so all my ebooks are Kobo. customer_reviews.title: Frustrating to use due to tilt sensors
customer_reviews.text: It’s a solid eReader but I can’t give it more than two stars for one INCREDIBLY frustrating flaw. It’s orientation sensor is very inconsistent and any small movement while reading can cause it to change orientation. Even after locking orientation in portrait mode, any slight tilt while reading can cause it to flip the screen upside down. So I either have to hold it PERFECTLY still the entire time or get interrupted every few minutes with a bout of frantic waving to get the screen back to its correct orientation. It’s such a simple software patch. Just disable screen rotation completely. I’d stay away from this product.
customer_reviews.author: Dion C

customer_reviews.title: Converted to Kobo
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a device like the Oasis, I tried later version of this Kindle model (10th) and it was too slippery and made me press the page-turning buttons by accident. The Kobo Forma is amazing. Easier to use than a kindle invites reading with the progress statistics and the screensaver is the cover of the current book. Holding it is very comfortable. The price here a lot higher than on the Kobo website, buy it from kobo.com. Excellent device.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge Roque

customer_reviews.title: Landscape view locks and too big for jeans back pocket
customer_reviews.text: My Kobo Aura One screen died after 2.5 yrs. I liked the product a lot but decided to try the Forma. A big mistake. The major problem is screen orientation and freezing in landscape mode. I tried landscape a few times and the last time I couldn't get back to portrait and couldn't even get to Home. After a week of remaining frozen I am returning the Forma to Walmart and ordering the Aura One Limited Edition from Kobo. I also don't like that it won't fit in the back pocket of my jeans. The Aura One did.
customer_reviews.author: T Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: The best ereader by far!
customer_reviews.text: As of June 2019, all issues are resolved and this is absolutely the best, largest and most responsive ereader out there. Fantastic lighting, light weight, large size and screen rotation are amazing. Don't hesitate!
